   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: -module(cover_nomerge_remote_nostop_SUITE).
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   27: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [].
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [t1,t2].
   34: 
   35: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   36:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
   37:     Node = list_to_atom("ct_nomerge@"++Host),
   38:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
   39:     [{node,Node}|Config].
   40: 
   41: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   45:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   46:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   47: 
   48: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   49:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   50:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   54: %%% Test cases
   55: break(_Config) ->
   56:     test_server:break(""),
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: t1(Config) ->
   60:     Node = ?config(node,Config),
   61:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node, code, which, [cover_test_mod]),
   62:     ok = rpc:call(Node, cover_test_mod, foo, []),
   63:     ok.
   64: 
   65: t2(Config) ->
   66:     Node = ?config(node,Config),
   67:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node, code, which, [cover_test_mod]),
   68:     ok = rpc:call(Node, cover_test_mod, foo, []),
   69:     ok.
